Topic.Title: New Project! Never done one before!

Posts.EditableText:
Starting a new Project! [GameBook Adventure] Never done one before, or a Text Adventure either but whatever! Thats why I am looking for other people to start this with me! If its not possible to allow you to edit with me, Then maybe you could be my tutor or something, Someone I can go to if I have questions you know...Anyways Comment below if you want to edit with me or be my tutor! Or Email: AnOddSoullessPerson@yahoo.com
Thank you!!! 

[Abide the rules citizen! You have been warned!]

Posts.EditableText:
Your name seems fitting.  =)

As far as a tutor goes... It depends on if you plan on using the interface almost exclusively or if you have good experience with code and are comfortable using it within the Quest framework.  I can be pretty useful, I think, when it comes to using the interface, but there are those who are far more knowledgeable when it comes to code.  Or, you can just fire your questions away on the message forum and the people here are very good and willing to help and do so pretty darned quickly.
Posts.HTML:
Your name seems fitting. =)

As far as a tutor goes... It depends on if you plan on using the interface almost exclusively or if you have good experience with code and are comfortable using it within the Quest framework. I can be pretty useful, I think, when it comes to using the interface, but there are those who are far more knowledgeable when it comes to code. Or, you can just fire your questions away on the message forum and the people here are very good and willing to help and do so pretty darned quickly.

Posts.EditableText: Keep in mind too that "GameBooks" are much harder to find help for than "Text Adventures" so if you are new to coding, I would start with a text adventure. Gamebooks are much newer and therefore the help is limited. Good luck with your game!
Posts.HTML: Keep in mind too that "GameBooks" are much harder to find help for than "Text Adventures" so if you are new to coding, I would start with a text adventure. Gamebooks are much newer and therefore the help is limited. Good luck with your game!

Posts.EditableText: I'm currently working on a Gamebook game and I'd be glad to help you as best as I can
